title: Jonypaul
author: Jonypaul
content: Hello everyone.As my first post, being new in crypto, Â I will let you know about an app where you win Theta USDT putting likes on facebook, tiktok and/or youtube. (If it isn't allowed to post this kind of things just tell me and i delete)Basically they give you links to out like on them You put like and take a screenshot of it.After you upload it to the app and click submit, done.You are paid a certain value of USDT per like, depending on your VIP Level.After, you can transfer the USDT easily to your crypto account by TRC20 network.They have a free trial where you can make untill 10USDT and transfer them to you crypto account for free If you guys want to try it just send me pm and i give you the link (if it is permited to out it here directly let me know and I will put it).This is a new thing that started in January in Portugal.I entered in the begining of May and already recovered all my investment.Right now I'm making 132usdt a day just putting likes
